mapper.select:
select f.f_num as f_num, f.f_title as f_title, f.f_content as f_content, f.f_days as f_days, f.f_enddate as f_enddate, f.f_target as f_target, f.f_totalmoney as f_totalmoney, f.f_rate as f_rate, f.f_status as f_status, f.f_reward as f_reward, f.f_price as f_price, f.f_bname as f_bname, f.f_bnum as f_bnum, f.f_regdate as f_regdate, f.member_m_num as m_num, i.i_num as i_num, i.i_name as filename, i.i_uuid as uuid, i.i_type as i_type from ( select * from image where (funding_f_num, i_num) in ( select r.* from (select funding_f_num, min(i_num) as i_num from image where i_type = 1 group by funding_f_num) as r) ) as i inner join funding f on f.f_num = i.funding_f_num where 1 and f.f_status in (3,4,5)
and f.f_title like concat('%', #{searchName} ,'%')
and f.f_status = #{searchStatus}
order by f.f_status asc,
f.f_enddate asc,
f.f_likeCount desc,
f.f_num desc limit #{pageStart}, #{amount}

select f.f_num as f_num, f.f_title as f_title, f.f_content as f_content, f.f_days as f_days, f.f_enddate as f_enddate, f.f_target as f_target, f.f_totalmoney as f_totalmoney, f.f_rate as f_rate, f.f_status as f_status, f.f_reward as f_reward, f.f_price as f_price, f.f_bname as f_bname, f.f_bnum as f_bnum, (select m.m_id from member m where m.m_num = f.member_m_num) as m_id, (select COUNT(l.l_num) from likefunding l where l.funding_f_num = f.f_num group by (funding_f_num)) as l_count, i.i_num as i_num, i.i_name as filename, i.i_uuid as uuid, i.i_type as i_type from funding f left outer join image i on f.f_num = i.funding_f_num where f.f_num = #{f_num}
mapper.insert:
select max(f_num) as f_num from funding
insert into funding( f_title, f_content, f_days, f_enddate, f_reward, f_price, f_bname, f_bnum, member_m_num ) values( #{f_title}, #{f_content}, #{f_days}, (SELECT DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL #{f_days} DAY)), #{f_reward}, #{f_price}, #{f_bname}, #{f_bnum}, #{m_num} )
insert into image( i_name, i_uuid, i_type, funding_f_num ) values( #{filename}, #{uuid}, #{filetype}, #{f_num} )
mapper.select: select d_num as d_num, d_name as d_name, d_phone as d_phone, d_zipcode as d_zipcode, d_addr as d_addr, d_detailaddr as d_detailaddr from delivery where d_num = (select MAX(delivery_d_num) from purchase where member_m_num = #{m_num})
select f_num, f_title, f_content, f_days, f_enddate, f_target, f_totalmoney, f_rate, f_status, f_reward, f_price, f_bname, f_bnum, f_regdate from funding where f_status = 3 and f_enddate < now()
select f_num, f_title, f_content, f_days, f_enddate, f_target, f_totalmoney, f_rate, f_status, f_reward, f_price, f_bname, f_bnum, f_regdate from funding where f_status = 5
